-- Hoogle documentation, generated by Haddock
-- See Hoogle, http://www.haskell.org/hoogle/


-- | Receive hooks from pagure and do things with them
--   
@package pagure-hook-receiver
@version 0.1.0.0


-- | Common hooks for pagure updates
module Web.Pagure.HookReceiver.StandardHooks
cloneRepo :: MonadIO m => String -> m ()

-- | Clones the repo if necessary, using <a>cloneRepo</a>, then adds a
--   github remote and pushes to it (using <tt>--all</tt> so that tags and
--   branches get mirrored as well).
githubMirror :: MonadIO m => String -> String -> String -> m ()


-- | The POST hook receiver for Pagure projects.
module Web.Pagure.HookReceiver.Post
runPagureListener :: Int -> Map String [String -> IO ()] -> IO ()
